title: Package service, Full-size washers/dryers, French doors*
posting_body: ['Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 47', 'OR Text', '47', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our leasing team.', 'This is a 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1407 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Traditional yet modern.', 'Sophisticated yet casual.', 'Living here is sure to excite your senses and offer you an incredible retreat.', "Our one, two, and three bedroom apartments, located in the heart of Santa Clarita, provide you with all of the comfort you'll enjoy and all of the luxury you deserve.", 'Live Provence at Valencia and experience la dolce vita.', 'Features:', 'Computer niche or lofts*, Full-size washers/dryers, Elegant architectural styling with stucco and stone, Direct access garages*, Pass-through breakfast bars, Covered parking, 9-foot ceilings with crown molding and fans, Oversized plant ledges, Covered patios or balconies, Oval tubs, Luxury plank flooring*, Linen closets, Amenities and features subject to change.', '*', 'In select units., Microwaves, Newly renovated units, French doors*', 'Community Amenities:', 'Fire pit in pool area, Cabana, Beautiful clubroom with kitchen, fireplace, and cyber lounge, Jogging, bike, and natural trails, State-of-the-art fitness center, Resort-style swimming pool and spa, Business center (Mac & PC computers), Playground, Courtesy patrol, Wading pool, Package service, Terrace attached to clubhouse', 'Pet Policy', 'Pets Welcome!', '$500 deposit $50 a month for dogs $40 a month cats', 'Want more information on this unit?', 'See link (below):', '<URL>', 'Greystar California, Inc., Broker License #01525765', 'DMCA Agent: <URL>', 'YQAc59iMEB3Y']
